EmailTemplate.description: Sends out our Service and Counter Sale Surveys.
EmailTemplate.name: Service Survey 2.0
EmailTemplate.subject: Hello {!AcctSeed__Project__c.AcctSeed__Account__c} from Legend Boats!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We are inviting you to participate in a quick survey because you are a valuable client to us here at Legend Boats.
We actively use feedback to constantly improve ourselves and provide you with the best possible service because we know that your boat is your baby.
This will take as little as 2 minutes and you will really be helping us out!
Please click on the link below to get'er done.
